item.title: Automating Windows Server STIG Compliance with STIG Scripts
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "Windows Server" , "STIG Compliance" , "Automation" , "Scripting" , "Enterprise Environments" , "Security" , "Windows Server 2012" , "Windows Server 2012 R2" , "Windows Server 2016" , "Windows Server 2019"
item.description: Learn how to automate STIGing Windows Server 2012, 2016, and 2019 with the Windows STIG Script, ensuring compliance with various organizations' recommendations and requirements.
